data.comment: Today's referee, Simon Hooper, has blown to start the match.
Goal! Junior Stanislas gives Bournemouth a 1-0 lead in Bournemouth.
In the minute 3, David Brooks instrumental with a fine assist.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
In the minute 49, Bournemouth have been awarded a penalty...
Junior Stanislas smashes in a penalty at Vitality Stadium. The score is now 2-0.
The away team have replaced Joe Lolley with Anthony Knockaert. This is the first substitution made today by Chris Hughton.
In the minute 71, Dan Gosling is on a sub for David Brooks for Bournemouth.
Miguel Angel Guerrero is replacing Harry Arter for Nottingham at Vitality Stadium.
Diego Rico Salguero is replacing Jefferson Lerma for the home team.
In the minute 80, Bournemouth's Dan Gosling has been booked in Bournemouth.
Lewis Cook (Bournemouth) has received a yellow card from Simon Hooper.
Simon Hooper blows to end the match. The final score is 2-0.
The home team replace Arnaut Danjuma with Rodrigo Riquelme.
